synopsis.text: Kocho Kuma, the principal of Ã‰toile Vio School, sets the stage for a challenging journey for the young idol hopefuls known as IChu. As these aspiring stars embark on their quest to become full-fledged idols, they are faced with the daunting task of defining the true essence of an idol. Through trials and tribulations, the IChu are pushed to their limits as they strive to achieve their individual goals. In their pursuit of stardom, the IChu's lives unfold in a dazzling display of brilliance, leaving the audience to witness the making of the next generation of idols. Their captivating story of self-discovery and determination begins now.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
